name: Exprima Media
overview:
Exprima Media partners with content providers to design effective and engaging educational apps for the web and mobile devices such as the iPhone and iPad. Our work helps make learning more explorative, collaborative, and ubiquitous.

Founded by former anthropology professor Corey Pressman, Exprima Media combines the latest thinking in cultural anthropology, interaction design and the graphic arts to craft clear and effective educational media.

Exprima Media is currently working with publishers such as W.W. Norton, John Wiley & Sons, and McGraw Hill to build the future of educational interactive media.
